mapper.insert: insert into payment(actual_price,pay_channel, is_successful, begin_time, end_time, order_id, gmt_create, gmt_modified, is_deleted) values (#{actualPrice}, #{payChannel},0, now(), date_add(now(), interval 30 minute), #{orderId}, now(), now(), 0)
mapper.select: select id, actual_price, pay_channel, is_successful as beSuccessful, pay_time, pay_sn, begin_time, end_time, order_id, is_deleted as beDeleted, gmt_create, gmt_modified from payment where id = #{id} and is_deleted = 0

select id, actual_price, pay_channel, is_successful as beSuccessful, pay_time, pay_sn, begin_time, end_time, order_id, is_deleted as beDeleted, gmt_create, gmt_modified from payment where pay_sn = #{paySn} and is_deleted = 0
